description: This file implements a React route component for displaying, editing, updating, and deleting individual notes within a note management application. It uses hooks from Remix for routing and state management, including fetching note data, handling user actions like save and delete, and rendering the note editing interface.

methods.name: NoteDetailRoute
methods.description: Main React component for displaying and editing a specific note identified by noteId parameter. Handles fetching the note, maintaining local state, and providing save and delete functionalities.

methods.name: ErrorBoundary
methods.description: Error boundary component to display fallback UI when an error occurs within the NoteDetailRoute component tree.
